scripts.db:master:config: cat ./sql/master/init.sql | docker exec -i mysql_master mysql -u root -proot
scripts.db:master:dump: docker exec -i mysql_master mysqldump -u root -proot store > ./dump/mydb.sql
scripts.db:slave1:create: cat ./createdb.sql | docker exec -i mysql_s1 mysql -u root -proot
scripts.db:slave2:create: cat ./createdb.sql | docker exec -i mysql_s2 mysql -u root -proot
scripts.db:slave1:dump-restore: docker exec -i mysql_s1 mysql -u root -proot store < ./dump/mydb.sql
scripts.db:slave2:dump-restore: docker exec -i mysql_s2 mysql -u root -proot store < ./dump/mydb.sql
scripts.db:slave1:config: cat ./sql/replica/init.sql | docker exec -i mysql_s1 mysql -u root -proot
scripts.db:slave2:config: cat ./sql/replica/init.sql | docker exec -i mysql_s2 mysql -u root -proot
scripts.db:slave1:stop: cat ./sql/replica/stop.sql | docker exec -i mysql_s1 mysql -u root -proot
scripts.db:slave2:stop: cat ./sql/replica/stop.sql | docker exec -i mysql_s2 mysql -u root -proot
scripts.db:create-table: cat ./startup.sql | docker exec -i mysql_master mysql -u root -proot
